de.esoco.process

Class EntityProcessDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
      • org.obrel.core.SerializableRelatedObject
        • de.esoco.process.ProcessDefinition
          • de.esoco.process.StepListProcessDefinition
            • de.esoco.process.EntityProcessDefinition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.lib.manage.ElementDefinition<Process>, java.io.Serializable, org.obrel.core.Relatable

    public abstract class EntityProcessDefinition
extends StepListProcessDefinition
    A subclass of the step list-based process definition for entity-specific processes. It contains additional methods to add process steps for the querying and manipulation of entities.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Annotates a relation with the parameters for an entity query.
        Parameters:
        rRelation - The relation to annotate
        pQuery - The entity query
        pSortOrder - The default sort order of the query or NULL for none
        rAttributes - The optional entity attributes to display or NONE for the default

                                                                       org.obrel.core.RelationType<? extends Entity> rEntityParam,
                                                                       CopyEntityAttributes.CopyMode eCopyMode)
        Adds an CopyEntityAttributes step that updates the attributes of an entity from the process parameters. If no entity exists in the given parameter a new entity instance of the parameter's target type will be created.
        Parameters:
        sName - The step name
        rEntityParam - The parameter that contains the entity
        eCopyMode - the copy mode
        Returns:
        The new step list entry

      • queryEntityById

        protected <E extends Entity> StepListProcessDefinition.StepListEntry queryEntityById(java.lang.String sName,
                                                                                     org.obrel.core.RelationType<E> rTargetParam)
        Adds a step that queries an entity by it's ID and stores in in a certain parameter. The entity ID must be stored in the process parameter with the type EntityRelationTypes.ENTITY_ID.
        Parameters:
        sName - The step name
        rTargetParam - The parameter to store the entity in
        Returns:
        The new step list entry

      • selectEntity

        protected <E extends Entity> StepListProcessDefinition.StepListEntry selectEntity(org.obrel.core.RelationType<? super E> rTargetParam,
                                                                                  de.esoco.storage.QueryPredicate<E> rQuery,
                                                                                  de.esoco.lib.expression.Function<? super E,?>... rAttributes)
        A convenience method that always generates the step name from the target parameter by prepending "Select" to the parameter's simple name.
        See Also:
        selectEntity(String, RelationType, QueryPredicate, Function...)

      • selectEntity

        protected <E extends Entity> StepListProcessDefinition.StepListEntry selectEntity(java.lang.String sName,
                                                                                  org.obrel.core.RelationType<? super E> rTargetParam,
                                                                                  de.esoco.storage.QueryPredicate<E> rQuery,
                                                                                  de.esoco.lib.expression.Function<? super E,?>... rAttributes)
        Adds an interactive process step to select an entity from a list that is defined by certain query criteria. The displayed attributes of an entity can be controlled with the attributes parameter. It contains functions that will retrieve the displayed values from a queried entity. In the simplest case this will only be the attribute relation types as these also implement the function interface. But basically this can be arbitrary complex functions that access entity hierarchies or generate values based on certain criteria.

        If the step name is null it will be generated from the target parameter by prepending "Select" to the parameter's simple name.

        Parameters:
        sName - The name of the interactive step
        rTargetParam - The parameter to store the selected entity in
        rQuery - The query criteria (NULL for all entities of the given type)
        rAttributes - A list of functions that will extract the query values from a queried entity or NULL for a default
        Returns:
        The new step list entry

      • storeEntity

        protected StepListProcessDefinition.StepListEntry storeEntity(org.obrel.core.RelationType<? extends Entity> rEntityParam)
        A convenience method that generates the step name from the entity parameter by prepending "Store" to the parameters simple name.
        See Also:
        storeEntity(String, RelationType)

      • storeEntity

        protected StepListProcessDefinition.StepListEntry storeEntity(java.lang.String sName,
                                                              org.obrel.core.RelationType<? extends Entity> rEntityParam)
        Adds a step to store an entity from a certain process parameter.
        Parameters:
        sName - The name of the step
        rEntityParam - The parameter the entity is stored in
        Returns:
        The new step list entry
